extendedInfo.description: You can easily manage your personal finances anytime, anywhere with InEx Finance Android app. Inex Finance personal money management software brings the powerful set of expense tracking and budgeting tools to the convenience of your Android device. With InEx Finance free Android app you have all your personal finances right at your fingertips, allowing you to make informed spending decisions in real-time and always be in the know of your actual financial standing. If you are constantly on the move or simply prefer using a mobile device while relaxing on your couch, then InEx Finance Android app is the optimal solution for handling your daily financial tasks in an easy and efficient way. InEx Finance for Android is a feature-rich app that lets you view, update and manage your financial data in online or off-line mode. To start using InEx Finance Android app, quickly sing up for an account on www.inexfinance.com and you are good to go!Key Features:Accounts* Simultaneous access to account data by multiple users;* Ability to lock the application via a pass code;* Log, view, edit or delete financial data while off-line;* Secured cloud sync across various platforms;* Ability to block synchronization for a specific user;* Run sync whenever convenient;* On-demand updates of financial data on InEx Finance web app and Android app;* Easily customizable account settings;* Data backup to CSV.Money Management* Unlimited number of fully customizable resources, categories and tags;* Ability to track income and expenses in multiple currencies under the same resource;* Split transactions by items;* Easily add, view or update transactions;* Set monthly budgets for spending categories and track performance;* Powerful budgeting tools: automatic budget generation, budget rollover;* Manage personal debts and deposits on the go;* Set financial goals and monitor your saving performance;* Project future spending with single or recurring events;* View reports on account balance, budgets, debts, goals and other.User Experience* Simple and intuitive user interface with smooth navigation throughout the app;* Supported languages: English and Russian;* Tags auto-complete;* Color labeling for resources, categories and events;* Built-in calculator for easy entry of amounts.Found a bug or have a suggestion? Please contact us by email at support@inexfinance.com.

reviews.title: Poor user interface & navigation options
reviews.comment: Web version - Imported my data, didn\'t see any issues. Account and category creation is easy. But reports and charts are not intuitive and not working intermittently. Android App - installed and synced my data, not impressed with Ui, needs more work.. But I see this app has potential to grab users once UI, reports and charts are made intuitive. It has all req\'rd funcs and distinct features but lacks ease which is essential for apps.. Also I didn\'t\' like creating two transactions for exporting transfers..
reviews.author: Nagendra N

reviews.title: Can\'t even login
reviews.comment: Tried to login through google account. Why redirect to browser instead of using android\'s google account? Can\'t login from browser though.
reviews.author: Ye Htut Lwin

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: The only household budgeting system where I can use both PC and android correctly AND also my wife can use the same account. This is the real meaning of a family budget..
reviews.author: Viktor Zs

reviews.title: Best of the best
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried many apps to track my expenses. Non of them as great as InEx. Both side use. Computer and mobile. And no need to back up on the cloud anymore. It\'s a whole system.
reviews.author: amado slim

reviews.title: Very slow...
reviews.comment: Looks like it sync with server on any touch
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Moves slowly
reviews.comment: It seems like it would be awesome, but it is EXTREMELY SLOW! Its ridiculous!
reviews.author: Alexandra McGee
